div.div:
Astronomy and geology are fun…! Mira, who promised to “find an asteroid” with the boy she found at the campsite as a child. She tried to join the astronomy club, but from this year the “astronomy club” and the “geology research society” merged into the “earth sciences club”!? Let’s go search for the asteroid that we promised to look for that day.
(Source: Manga Time Kirara Carat, translated)

The long-awaited serialized version of the popular one-shot. Takamine, who can't find something she likes, and Sakura, who loves books, meet by chance and begin spending time together after school. Are they just friends, or is there something more...? Where is the story of their relationship going to lead?
